text: Rollin Augustus "Rod" Daniel III (August 4, 1942 - April 16, 2016) was an American television and movie director. He directed the movies Teen Wolf (1985), Like Father Like Son (1987), K-9 (1989), The Super (1991), Beethoven's 2nd (1993) and Home Alone 4: Taking Back The House (2002). Daniel died at his home in Chicago, Illinois on April 16, 2016 from Parkinson's disease, aged 73. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1942 births Category:2016 deaths Category:Deaths from Parkinson's disease Category:American movie directors Category:American television directors Category:People from Nashville, Tennessee
title: Rod Daniel
